00025 /*! \file xcomplex.h
00026  *  convenience additions for std::complex
00027  *
00028  *  Copyright (C) 2003-2015 Max-Planck-Society
00029  *  \author Martin Reinecke
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef PLANCK_XCOMPLEX_H
00033 #define PLANCK_XCOMPLEX_H
00034 
00035 #include <complex>
00036 
00037 #define xcomplex std::complex
00038 typedef xcomplex<float>  fcomplex;
00039 typedef xcomplex<double> dcomplex;
00040 
00041 template<typename T> inline xcomplex<T> times_i(xcomplex<T> inp)
00042   { return xcomplex<T>(-inp.imag(),inp.real()); }
00043 
00044 #endif
